title: DeLLiriuM: A large language model for delirium prediction in the ICU using structured EHR
details: M Contreras, S Kapoor, J Zhang, A Davidson, Y Ren… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Delirium is an acute confusional state that has been shown to affect up to 31% of patients in the intensive care unit (ICU). Early detection of this condition could lead to more timely interventions and improved health outcomes. While artificial intelligence …
